title: PA List IPTC ninjs - News in JSON - version 1.1
description: A list wrapper around the Press Association (PA) modification of IPTC's Ninjs Schema.

total.description: The total number of news objects across all pages of the list.

limit.description: The number of news objects to return in 1 page of the list.

offset.description: The number of news objects to skip over before returning this page of the list.

item.description: The new objects returned in this page of the list.

events.description: Details of events referenced in the Item list.

*.description: An entry for an event. The key is the event's uri.
An entry for stats about a items linked to an event of a certain profile. The key is the value of the profile.
An entry for stats about a items linked to an event of a certain type. The key is the value of the type.

total.description: The total number of items linked to an event for the given profile & type.

links.description: HATEOAS style links related to the list of news object.

rel.description: The relationship of the link to the list of news object.

href.description: The URL for accessing the link.
